title: 5 Quick Steps to Add the Phone App Back to an iPhone

steps.title: Open the Settings app.
steps.content: Open the Settings app. This is the grey cog icon. Make sure your iPhone is updated to the latest version.

steps.title: Tap General.
steps.content: Tap General . This is in the section below Screen Time .

steps.title: Tap Transfer or Reset iPhone.
steps.content: Tap Transfer or Reset iPhone . This is at the very bottom of the page.

steps.title: Tap Reset.
steps.content: Tap Reset . You can find this at the bottom of the screen.

steps.title: Tap Reset Home Screen Layout.
steps.content: Tap Reset Home Screen Layout . This will be underneath Reset Keyboard Dictionary . Your Home screen will return to its factory layout with the Phone app. You'll need to readjust your apps , widgets , and background again. [1] X Research source
